edu.rit.pj2.tracker

Class TaskMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pj2.tracker.TaskMap

  • public class TaskMap
extends Object
    Class TaskMap holds information about the Tasks for a Job.

    Note: Class TaskMap is multiple thread safe.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TaskMap()
      Construct a new task map.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TaskInfo add()
      Construct a new task info object and add it to this task map.
      void forEachItemDo(Action<TaskInfo> action)
      Perform the given action on each task info object in this task map.
      TaskInfo get(long taskID)
      Get the given task info object in this task map.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Determine if this task map is empty.
      TaskInfo remove(long taskID)
      Remove the given task info object from this task map.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaskMap

        public TaskMap()
        Construct a new task map.

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Determine if this task map is empty.
        Returns:
        True if this task map is empty, false if it isn't.

      • add

        public TaskInfo add()
        Construct a new task info object and add it to this task map. The taskID field is set to the next available task ID. The other fields are not initialized.
        Returns:
        Task info object.

      • get

        public TaskInfo get(long taskID)
        Get the given task info object in this task map. If the given task ID does not exist, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        taskID - Task ID.
        Returns:
        Task info object, or null.

      • remove

        public TaskInfo remove(long taskID)
        Remove the given task info object from this task map. If the given task ID does not exist, nothing happens and null is returned.
        Parameters:
        taskID - Task ID.
        Returns:
        Task info object that was removed, or null.

      • forEachItemDo

        public void forEachItemDo(Action<TaskInfo> action)
        Perform the given action on each task info object in this task map.
        Parameters:
        action - Action.
